list_definition.definition: to direct, guide or move (a ship, aircraft etc) in a particular direction

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He navigated the ship through the dangerous rocks.

list_definition.definition: to find or follow one’s route when in a ship, aircraft, car etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If I drive, will you navigate?
